name: Fox Johnson
description:
Fox Johnson is a detective in Mammoth City. Lost in the city, he must uncover the truth!

Controls:

Arrow keys to move.
Z - Jump
X - Interact
You can direct your throws by holding an arrow-key before pressing X.

Credits:
